metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10169 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The read_code function in read_words.c in Wavpack before 5.1.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted WV file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10169` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwavpack1 - 4.75.2-2ubuntu0.1
wavpack - 4.75.2-2ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wavpack package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.75.2-2ubuntu0.1').
